lines: Uggghhhhhh....
Shit, the house shifted again,
I'm never buying a house from krusty men in back alleys again.
I knew that Calvin Klien Tattoo wasn't the real deal
ALSO, the dev wishes to inform you to press M to mute music
It's a Door... There's a Doorknob, but turning it with no fingers is too much of a pain.
Plus, we don't have enough money to animate me opening this.
I realise that I can get out through the window, but the game won't let me
I guess you'll have to enjoy this quality gameplay.
It's a rock, we need a way to destroy it
Maybe we can hurl insults at it over the internet...
Haha! We have triumphed over the rock
Do you feel better about yourself?
It's a scarecrow,
I encourage violence.
The deed is done,
What will you tell its poor mother?
I can't fit though that... The pixels add 25 pounds...
At least the Switch is in the room
Hopefully the keyboard has an E button
I am... not what you call a 'Fat Bottom Gurl'
I'll need to depress this button
Where did I put that copy of Titanic?
Welcome to the door room
Someone got trapped in here and had to chew his own arm off
Goes to show you really shouldn't ignore screaming in your own home
Gonna need more pickaxes
4 to be exact
it doesn't actually say that here, but the Dev is too lazy to put down a sign
He is however, not too lazy too write this dialogue
Really, it's the perfect amount of laziness
Perfect for hot summer days and backyard picnics
Perfect for the workplace
I mean really, you don't want a guy who's up on your grill all day just because he's got his life in order
But you don't want a hot mess either
So buy now, for $14.99
million dollars
But seriously, hire him
I think he's just writing this because he's got 4 hours left in the Jam with nothing to do
oh yeah, pickaxes. You'll need 4
4 is the number you'll need
not 1, not 2, not 5
four
Fore
for
okay... go now my son, into the wind...
It's Perilous to venture by yourself, take these
and don't sue
Good Boy
We did it!
Now we can both get on with our lives and never see each other again
Wall, meet player
I hope you have a wonderful life together
'try the window' ....
fuck this game.
'Need the Key for the final Boss'

'No Skipping allowed' 
                      ---Huge Douche
ARE YOU READY?
'Welcome to Historic Casa la Gama, a romantic 25-bit Estate full of life's many pleasure'
What a load of bull
Some of the funiture in this place are 30-bit
Under Construction...
It's been like this for years
I've yet to see a worker alive in this place
Hey look, it's Robert
He took his masters nearby, I'd always though he moved to the UK for a PhD
Looks like he rotted over my favorite comic book
You know, sometimes it's just inconvenient when your swords look like pickaxes
That's why I store my murder tools in high resolution
Ah, a blade, just what I needed. I just hope it doesn't become something else when we turn down the resolution
